lead_paragraph: A court filing in the Department of Justice’s discrimination case against Trump Management describes the complaint of Maxine Brown, a young black nurse who sought an apartment at a Trump property in late 1963. The document was contained in the National Archives. The Times has redacted address information from the file.

headline.main: A Recounting of Maxine Brown’s Complaint
